p: Effects of B.V extracts on RBC, WBC and Platelets levels were assessed. After administration of CCl4 to experimental animals, levels of RBC, WBC and Platelets were decreased as relate to normal ( Fig. 5). Current findings specify that the flower extracts and silymarine standard drug increased above parameters to normal ranges (normal group) and further improvement can depends on amount of dose given. Rapid rise or decline in hematological parameters is the source to weaken animal immune system and these persistent conditions end in severe consequences ( Carvalho et al., 2011).
